attributes.action: Get Joe-Julian Naitsri back into Dr. Challoners
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Joe-Julian was a much loved student in the school. It is unfair to expel Joe-Julian for the incident, when around 15 other students where involved. Joe-Julian didn't mean to cause the damage he done and is greatly sorry.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
